name: Split (itch) (joebellomo)
description:
Two souls intertwined

Swapping identities just to stay alive

This unlucky duo must try to survive

For if they're split, they'll surely die

In this top-down shooter, you have the power to swap between two identities to avoid enemies and they're projectiles, while also shooting the right ammunition at said enemies. This project was made in 7 days for the Game Dev Hideout Game Jam #1
